verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
"Oh <S%H3863>that<s%> my <S%H3708>anguish<s%> <S%H8254>were<s%> <S%H8254>weighed,<s%> and all my <S%H1942>calamity<s%> <S%H5375>laid<s%> <S%H3162>in<s%> the <S%H3976>balances!<s%>
For now it would be <S%H3513>heavier<s%> than the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> therefore have my <S%H1697>words<s%> been <S%H3886>rash.<s%>

For the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> are <S%H5978>within<s%> <S%H7307>me.<s%> My spirit drinks <S%H8354>up<s%> their <S%H2534>poison.<s%> The <S%H1161>terrors<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> set themselves in array against <S%H6186>me.<s%>
Does the wild <S%H6501>donkey<s%> <S%H5101>bray<s%> when he has <S%H1877>grass?<s%> Or does the <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H1600>low<s%> over his <S%H1098>fodder?<s%>
Can that which has no <S%H8602>flavor<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%> without <S%H4417>salt?<s%> Or is <S%H3426>there<s%> any <S%H2940>taste<s%> in the <S%H7388>white<s%> of an <S%H2495>egg?<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H1741>them.<s%> They are as loathsome food to <S%H3899>me.<s%>
"Oh that I might <S%H935>have<s%> my <S%H7596>request,<s%> that <S%H433>God<s%> would <S%H5414>grant<s%> the thing that I long <S%H8615>for,<s%>
even that it would <S%H2974>please<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> to <S%H1792>crush<s%> <S%H5425>me;<s%> that he would let loose his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and cut me <S%H1214>off!<s%>

Be it still my <S%H5165>consolation,<s%> <S%H5539>yes,<s%> let me exult in <S%H2427>pain<s%> that <S%H2550>doesn't<s%> spare, that I have not <S%H3582>denied<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of the Holy <S%H6918>One.<s%>
What is my <S%H3581>strength,<s%> that I should <S%H3176>wait?<s%> What is my <S%H7093>end,<s%> that I should <S%H5315>be<s%> <S%H748>patient?<s%>
Is my <S%H3581>strength<s%> the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of <S%H68>stones?<s%> Or is my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H5153>brass?<s%>
<S%H5833>Isn't<s%> it that I have no help in <S%H8454>me,<s%> That wisdom is driven quite from <S%H5080>me?<s%>

"To him who is <S%H4523>ready<s%> to <S%H2617>faint,<s%> kindness should be shown from his <S%H7453>friend;<s%> even to him who <S%H5800>forsakes<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
My <S%H251>brothers<s%> have dealt <S%H898>deceitfully<s%> as a <S%H5158>brook,<s%> as the <S%H650>channel<s%> of <S%H5158>brooks<s%> that pass <S%H5674>away;<s%>
Which are <S%H6937>black<s%> by reason of the <S%H7140>ice,<s%> in which the <S%H7950>snow<s%> hides <S%H5956>itself.<s%>
<S%H6256>In<s%> the dry <S%H6256>season,<s%> they <S%H6789>vanish.<s%> When it is <S%H2527>hot,<s%> they are consumed <S%H1846>out<s%> of their <S%H4725>place.<s%>
The <S%H734>caravans<s%> that travel <S%H1870>beside<s%> them turn <S%H3943>aside.<s%> They <S%H5927>go<s%> up into the <S%H8414>waste,<s%> and <S%H6>perish.<s%>
The <S%H734>caravans<s%> of <S%H8485>Tema<s%> <S%H5027>looked.<s%> The <S%H1979>companies<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> waited for <S%H6960>them.<s%>
They were <S%H954>distressed<s%> because they were <S%H982>confident.<s%> They <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H2659>there,<s%> and were confounded.
For now you are <S%H7200>nothing.<s%> You see a <S%H2866>terror,<s%> and are <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>
Did I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3051><s%> 'Give to <S%H7809>me?<s%>' or, 'Offer a present for me from your <S%H3581>substance?<s%>'
<S%H4422>or,<s%> 'Deliver me from the <S%H6862>adversary<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand?<s%>' <S%H6299>or,<s%> 'Redeem me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6184>oppressors?<s%>'
<S%H3384>"Teach<s%> <S%H2790>me,<s%> and I will hold my peace. Cause me to <S%H995>understand<s%> wherein I have <S%H7686>erred.<s%>
How <S%H4834>forcible<s%> are <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H3476>uprightness!<s%> But your <S%H3198>reproof,<s%> what does it <S%H3198>reprove?<s%>
Do you <S%H2803>intend<s%> to <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H4405>words,<s%> since the <S%H561>speeches<s%> of one who is <S%H2976>desperate<s%> are as <S%H7307>wind?<s%>
<S%H5307>Yes,<s%> you would even cast lots for the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and make <S%H3738>merchandise<s%> of your <S%H7453>friend.<s%>
Now therefore be <S%H2974>pleased<s%> to <S%H6437>look<s%> at <S%H6440>me,<s%> for surely I shall not lie to your <S%H3576>face.<s%>
Please <S%H7725>return.<s%> Let there be no <S%H5766>injustice.<s%> <S%H7725>Yes,<s%> return again. My cause is <S%H6664>righteous.<s%>
Is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H5766>injustice<s%> on my <S%H3956>tongue?<s%> <S%H2441>Can't<s%> my taste <S%H995>discern<s%> mischievous <S%H1942>things?<s%>
